thread.title: Shakira Dancing Bachata on Instagram March 2017
thread.title_full: Shakira Dancing Bachata on Instagram March 2017 | POPSUGAR Latina

author: Alessandra Foresto
title: Shakira Dancing Bachata on Instagram March 2017
text:
A post shared by Shakira (@shakira) on Mar 9, 2017 at 12:13pm PST
We just had to physically pick our bodies from the floor because we fell down when we saw how sexy Shakira's bachata dance moves are. The Colombian singer already shocked us when she released "Deja Vu," her sultry song with Prince Royce , and now that she's giving us a behind the scenes peek at the music video, we're thinking she was always meant to sing bachata.
Press play in the videos above and below to be hypnotized by Shakira's swaying hips as she practices her dance moves, all while wearing a sky-high stilettos and a backless mini dress. "Practicing my bachata on the video set! Get ready for it . . . coming soon," she captioned one of the videos. Like, how soon?
Seguimos practicando bachata para nuestro video Deja Vu! Shak @princeroyce
A post shared by Shakira (@shakira) on Mar 14, 2017 at 10:03am PDT
